title: style with cannellini beans in tomato and sage sauce
ingredients: 3 tbsp finely chopped fresh rosemary leaves
1 loin of pork on the bone, weighing 1.25-2kg/3-4lb
2 tbsp of extra virgin olive oil
coarse salt and freshly ground pepper
3 tbsp of extra virgin olive oil, plus a little extra for serving
250g/9oz dried white haricot or cannellini beans, soaked overnight, or 500g/1lb 2oz tinned cannellini beans
salt and freshly ground black pepper
350g/12oz very ripe, soft tomatoes, puréed in a liquidiser or processor then sieved, OR 300g/11oz passata
